privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At Mobil Garage Door, we prioritize the security of your personal and financial data. This policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your information, specifically regarding our dispatch and payment systems.
privacy.section1_intro: We collect information necessary to provide our garage door repair and installation services, including:
privacy.identity_data: Name, phone number, and email address.
privacy.location_data: Service address and gate codes/access instructions.
privacy.financial_data: Payment card details (processed securely via Square), transaction history, and billing addresses.
privacy.technical_data: IP address and browser data when you use our digital booking tools.
privacy.section2_intro: Your data is used strictly for operational purposes:
privacy.dispatching: Assigning technicians to your specific location efficiently.
privacy.communication: Sending real-time updates about technician arrival and job status.
privacy.billing: Processing payments, issuing refunds, and generating invoices.
privacy.customer_service: maintaining a history of your repairs for warranty and support.
privacy.section3_intro: We do not sell your data. We share data only with trusted infrastructure partners required to operate our business:
privacy.square: For secure payment processing and customer profile management. When you pay us, your transaction data is stored in Square's secure vault.
privacy.google_maps: To validate addresses and route technicians.
privacy.twilio: For transactional SMS and email notifications.
privacy.section4_text: We employ industry-standard encryption (TLS/SSL) for data in transit. We do not store full credit card numbers on our own servers; all sensitive financial data is tokenized and handled directly by Square's PCI-compliant infrastructure.
privacy.section5_text: You have the right to request access to the personal data we hold about you, or to request its deletion (subject to legal record-keeping requirements). To exercise these rights, please contact our support team.
privacy.section6_text: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. The latest version will always be available on this page.
privacy.contact_text: If you have questions about this policy, please email us at
